items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

items.content_html: 𝙵𝚞𝚓𝚒𝚗𝙺𝚒𝚝 𝚒𝚜 𝚘𝚙𝚎𝚗 𝚜𝚘𝚞𝚛𝚌𝚎 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚖𝚊𝚍𝚎 𝚠𝚒𝚝𝚑 𝚕𝚘𝚟𝚎 (𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚊 𝚝𝚘𝚞𝚌𝚑 𝚘𝚏 𝚍𝚎𝚜𝚙𝚊𝚒𝚛), 𝚒𝚗 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚑𝚘𝚙𝚎𝚜 𝚝𝚑𝚊𝚝 𝚘𝚗𝚎 𝚍𝚊𝚢 -- 𝚓𝚞𝚜𝚝 𝚖𝚊𝚢𝚋𝚎 𝚊 𝚐𝚘𝚟𝚎𝚛𝚗𝚖𝚎𝚗𝚝 𝚊𝚐𝚎𝚗𝚌𝚢 𝚠𝚒𝚕𝚕 𝚞𝚜𝚎 𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚕𝚒𝚋𝚛𝚊𝚛𝚢 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚖𝚊𝚔𝚎 𝚜𝚘𝚖𝚎𝚝𝚑𝚒𝚗𝚐 𝚞𝚜𝚊𝚋𝚕𝚎.
items.title: inomag/fujin-kit: 𝙵𝚞𝚓𝚒𝚗𝙺𝚒𝚝 𝚒𝚜 𝚘𝚙𝚎𝚗 𝚜𝚘𝚞𝚛𝚌𝚎 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚖𝚊𝚍𝚎 𝚠𝚒𝚝𝚑 𝚕𝚘𝚟𝚎 (𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚊 𝚝𝚘𝚞𝚌𝚑 𝚘𝚏 𝚍𝚎𝚜𝚙𝚊𝚒𝚛), 𝚒𝚗 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚑𝚘𝚙𝚎𝚜 𝚝𝚑𝚊𝚝 𝚘𝚗𝚎 𝚍𝚊𝚢 -- 𝚓𝚞𝚜𝚝 𝚖𝚊𝚢𝚋𝚎 𝚊 𝚐𝚘𝚟𝚎𝚛𝚗𝚖𝚎𝚗𝚝 𝚊𝚐𝚎𝚗𝚌𝚢 𝚠𝚒𝚕𝚕 𝚞𝚜𝚎 𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚕𝚒𝚋𝚛𝚊𝚛𝚢 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚖𝚊𝚔𝚎 𝚜𝚘𝚖𝚎𝚝𝚑𝚒𝚗𝚐 𝚞𝚜𝚊𝚋𝚕𝚎.

items.content_html: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building — all in a lightweight package.
items.title: TheAstroX/Quantava: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building — all in a lightweight package.

items.content_html: GhostPay-Lite is a lightweight, secure, and scalable payment token microservice API that issues single-use virtual cards and processes charges.

items.content_html: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution and persistence.
items.title: Sadaf2005/ReCache: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution  and persistence.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.
items.title: henrygad/makzontexteditor: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
